title: **AD** NU~~OOB~~NU >"Gud P@55ive"
body:
Much WOW CRIT AFFECT PASSIVE< OMG SOZE BORKLEN XDDDDDD Duo 20%AS, 10%MS, 4 Secs, 10sec cd per Champ,Large/EpicMonster No Cannon/Super CS
100 aoe passive at 420{{summoner:14}}  ad 30%bonus but doesn't apply bonus dmg to main target
Vs {{item:3085}}  {{item:3031}} critting for 137 from 67 dmg  at 160 ad has 20% mo attack speed ,3%(possibly 5%)less ms

Vs {{item:3077}} {{item:3812}}  50 - 151 ad aoe, 151-250ish active at 151 ad,gives reliableburst and clear speed superior to passive

Lasts for 4 sec on any dmg, aka throw ur snowball, ignite out, bam u already lost a good 1-1.5 secs, maybe 2.5 if the (probably) mobile enemy dashes, away, cap duration of 40 secs,doesn't stack like 5 man quicky ult,~~(aint nobody got time to wait for ur full ult as mobile flash rightclick chimps unless brush or perma cc/afk)~~ ur not gonna get duo 100% AS, 50% MS for 20 secs,just passive+20 Sec(

OG AS, AD, Crit,Tank,Sup,Ap Swag Nunu used to **CLAP** people with ease 1v3 Viable
This Darude Sandstorm Flute blower in band camp Smug Snuzu struggles hard to even fight 1v2 (evenish v 1 if they don't dodge boulder alongside team)post 15 mins after abilties down to even get in range unless tank or ap, He's literally only good at  ulting minion waves, consuming the cannon creeps, taking the drags/epic monsters, horrible early clear speed than his predecessor, taking down turrets/nexus backdoor during teamfights, and even then you just constantly throw yourself at the enemy like silent wet doggy bag getting bigger deadly sion ult as ms ap/tank making them feel like sht when dying to it(prob gonna be nerfed).

_Fun _ fact: I made this post cause some1 responded to my question about nunu passive being hella gud,(its trashe tbh probably given aoe only because his jg clear speed blows now) turned into a heated debate of 1v9, and saw that rito is making diversity for these champs skewed and limited,like you could build whatever wierd niche build on that champ and it turned out nicely, this 1 is just copy pasting others build and it's so brind ded stale cause it's really only the most viable options in ur already decided 10 mins in snowball fiesta games.

TLDR;OG Nunu was viable in all builds like ms,ad,AS,Crit,could **CLAP** easily1v3,Disco Nunu{{summoner:1}} {{summoner:6}} {{item:3364}} and still most likely won OOts OOTs while tilting tf outta h8rs last game  hella fun
Darude Flute Noobnu struggles 1v2,is only viable ap(prob nerf to silent sion1 shot ult snowball)/tank(tanky asf);AD,As.Crit = 4 Objectives only, no kills/champdmg,useless at teamfights)
Trashe passive that does worse ad aoe dmg than {{item:3077}} {{item:3085}} can crit,barely noticeable weak duration stack only duo passive.

replies.body:
Am I the only one who imagined a crack-head geeking out while reading this?

I couldn't make it through it. 

What are you saying!? 
Slow down. 
Use complete sentences. 

And why do you have Runaan's in here. Nunu & Willump are melee champions so Runaan's doesn't work on them.
